pageContext.claim: “You know, the Black vote's not turning out for him. See, now we don't have to go by the fake polls. Now you see what's happening. He's not doing well with the Black vote.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a ridiculous claim. Black voters were among Biden's strongest supporters and a key factor in him winning the Democratic presidential nomination. Various exit polls in the 2020 election indicated that Biden won about 90 percent of the Black vote, with Black support being an important reason for Biden unexpectedly winning Georgia.
